ANNE BORREMANS IS A SENIOR VISUAL DESIGNER AT MOTIVATE. SHE HAS 7 YEARS EXPERIENCE IN AGENCY & IN-HOUSE VISUAL DESIGN.

START TO FINISH

She sees a project through from start to finish, working through both strategy and design.

MULTI-TALENTED

She is a consummate, all-media designer. From print to digital – she’s got you covered.

BEST ALL-AROUND

A truly creative spirit, she is a musician, fine artist, and all-around creator.

ANNE BORREMANS, SENIOR VISUAL DESIGNER

Anne is a modern day renaissance woman. When she’s not sculpting the next proto-neo-post-pre-non-genre band, she’s spilling design gold all over our most important deliverables. She holds a degree in Multimedia and Visual Art from Tufts University and the School of the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.
